subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chicago Blackhawks goaltender Nikolai Khabibulin has been put on waivers. Khabibulin is entering the final season of a four-year, $27 million contract. He joined the Blackhawks as a free agent after leading Tampa Bay to the 2004 Stanley Cup. The Blackhawks signed the free agent Cristobal Huet to a four-year, $22.5 million deal in July, giving them two top goalies. Khabibulin has been inconsistent and injured over the past three seasons. ¶Michael Nylander set up two second-period goals and Alex Ovechkin, the N.H.L. most valuable player last season, added a what proved to be a game-winning short-handed goal early in the third as the visiting Washington Capitals held beat the Devils, 3-2, for their fourth straight preseason victory. Zach Parise scored midway through the third period and Petr Vrana added a goal with 1 minute 52 seconds left for the Devils (2-2), who had won two games in a row. devils (AP).
